biotools.summary: Aids the identification of regions of Identity By Descent (IBD) in inbred individuals, by plotting and collating runs of homozygous SNP genotypes, ordered by physical or genetic distance.

bioschemas.name: IBDfinder
bioschemas.summary: Aids the identification of regions of Identity By Descent (IBD) in inbred individuals, by plotting and collating runs of homozygous SNP genotypes, ordered by physical or genetic distance.
